Name: Laundry Service
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York in relation to laundry service.

History.Description: This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Section 20-296 of the administrative code of the city of New York is hereby amended by adding a new subdivision h, to read as follows.
h.	No licensee shall combine in a single machine the laundry of more than one customer.  
Â§2.	This local law shall take effect immediately.
